articles.title: Make your own pan pizza just like an Italian family-run pizzeria that Stanley Tucci visited - CNN
articles.description: Most people think pan pizza and they think of mega American pizza chains, but one family-run Italian pizzeria has been baking this classic for more than 60 years.
